alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Worcester, east central Hampshire and southeastern Franklin Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1159 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pelham, or near Amherst, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Leominster, Amherst, Holden, Auburn, Belchertown, Spencer, Leicester, Ware, Templeton, Rutland, Sterling, West Boylston, Westminster, Barre, Paxton, North Brookfield, Hubbardston, West Brookfield and Princeton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
